long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can open up local folder link or the folder of the local file link when you click on it. Configure the "href" attribute of the anchor with the folder or the file link so that it starts with the "file:///" prefix. The anchor must contain the attribute "folder-opener", and you have to install the native app. When you click on the link the file explorer will open the folder of the link.
